title: All The Animals I Know
description: A fun book for children of all ages, it is a picture book that tells a story. The book is designed for children aged 0-4 and it helps them understand the animal kingdom. It is the story of a young boy who becomes anxious and lists all of the animals that he knows to help himself relax. Then he can start to play with his toys again. The children will love to look at the vibrant and exotic pictures that fill the pages of this book and the story unfolds through rhyming verse.
author: Leela Hope
